value.title: The Pentagon is using AI to predict events days into the future
value.excerpt: Before we talk about the US military using big data and artificial intelligence to try to predict future events, we might as well address the elephant -- or rather the notoriously small-statured but undeniably charismatic actor -- in the room.

value.title: AI-Powered Finance Startup Zeni Notches $34M Series B Funding
value.excerpt: Zeni raised $34 million in a Series B funding after seeing a 550 percent revenue growth year-over-year, driven by referrals and organic growth.

value.title: Reimagine knowledge discovery using Amazon Kendra’s Web Crawler
value.excerpt: When you deploy intelligent search in your organization, two important factors to consider are access to the latest and most comprehensive information, and a contextual discovery mechanism. Many companies are still struggling to make their internal documents searchable in a way that allows employees

value.title: Prompt-based learning can make language models more capable
value.excerpt: Supervised learning, where AI models are trained on input data annotated for a particular output until they can detect the underlying relationships between the inputs and outputs, plays a major role in natural language processing (NLP).

value.title: 'Master Face': Researchers Say They've Found a Wildly Successful Bypass for Face Recognition Tech
value.excerpt: Indeed, computer scientists at Tel Aviv University in Israel say they have discovered a way to bypass a large percentage of facial recognition systems by basically faking your face. The team calls this method the “master face” (like a “master key,

value.title: iMerit Announces New VP of Engineering to Fuel AI Technology Expansion
value.excerpt: LOS GATOS, Calif. and KOLKATA, India, Aug. 4, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- iMerit, a leading data labeling solutions company, announced today that Sudeep

value.title: Verizon Enlists AI in 5G Network Build-out
value.excerpt: The carrier uses an AI model to crunch through variables on the ground like trees, buildings and bridges to find the optimal spots to place thousands of 5G transmitters.

value.title: Tesla teases future products using artificial intelligence not related to its electric vehicle fleet
value.excerpt: In the invite to its AI Day, Tesla is teasing the use of artificial intelligence beyond its electric vehicle fleet. What do you think they’re talking about? As we have reported over the last week, Tesla is preparing for its upcoming AI Day on August 19.

value.title: Tesla 25 Dojo AI Training Chips in a Module Seen Ahead of AI Day
value.excerpt: Ahead of Tesla AI day on August 19, 2021 is what looks like a 25 AI chip module for the Dojo Training supercomputer.

value.title: Developing Coherent AI Infrastructure For Smart Cities
value.excerpt: Because of dense populations, and a concentration of equipment and machine based projects, AI’s ideal testing ground is a city.

value.title: Microsoft details AI model designed to improve Bing search
value.excerpt: Bing is now using an AI model designed to improve the the relevance of search results, according to Microsoft.

value.title: IDC: AI spending will reach $342B in 2021
value.excerpt: In a new report, IDC reports that companies will spend $342 billion on AI software, hardware, and services in 2021.

value.title: Word To The Wise: Do Not Try Asking An AI Self-Driving Car To Park In The Red
value.excerpt: If a passenger inside a self-driving car asks to be dropped off at a red curb, should the AI perform this potentially illegal act?

value.title: Sensorium demos AI-driven avatars as latest virtual beings
value.excerpt: All the sessions from Transform 2021 are available on-demand now. Watch now. Sensorium Galaxy is an upcoming virtual world that will blend human and AI characters so that humans can have unscripted conversations with virtual beings.

value.title: Can An AI Be An Inventor? New Legal Judgments Say Yes.
value.excerpt: Two landmark cases in the ongoing legal battle to establish an artificial intelligence system as an inventor came down in favor of the team trying to make this possible.

value.title: Spell unveils deep learning operations platform to cut AI training costs
value.excerpt: Spell takes wraps off deep learning operations (DLOps) platform that promises to reduce cost of building more advanced AI models.

value.title: A New Kind Of Alien: AI And The Hiring Process
value.excerpt: Not all aliens are depicted in popular culture as green or humanoid. In short, they could be robots. More specifically, we could venture to call AI an alien life form.

value.title: Accelerating Drug Discovery With Mindful AI
value.excerpt: For the past few years, the pharmaceutical industry has been exploring ways to improve drug discovery with artificial intelligence (AI). The process of researching, testing and developing therapeutic drugs and vaccines is costly and time-consuming.

value.title: C. Light Technologies uses AI to diagnose Alzheimer’s through retinal eye studies
value.excerpt: C. Light Technologies has raised money for its AI tech that detects changes in eye motion to diagnose early signs of Alzheimer's disease.

value.title: Why AI Is A Powerful Tool For Coinnovation
value.excerpt: AI is proving to be a powerful tool for coinnovation, but it won’t eliminate the need for raw human creativity, nor should it.

value.title: Yellow.ai raises $78M to expand its AI chatbot platform globally
value.excerpt: Yellow.ai, a startup developing a chatbot platform powered by AI technologies, has raised $78 million in venture capital.

value.title: POLITICO AI: Decoded: AI in hospitals — Standards bodies — Facial recognition
value.excerpt: How global thinking on AI is shaping the world, from Berlin, Brussels, London and beyond. POLITICO’s AI correspondent cuts through the noise, introduces you to the key decision-makers you’ve never heard of and tells you what those in power don’t want you to know.

value.title: AI-fueled app Natural offers new interface for consumer transactions
value.excerpt: A new app aims to bring more benefits of AI and machine learning to machine learning to consumes more directly, starting with a range of streamlined transactions.

value.title: Machine Learning Blood Analysis Could Predict Schizophrenia Risk
value.excerpt: An innovative strategy that analyzes a region of the genome offers the possibility of early diagnosis of schizophrenia, reports a research team.

value.title: Mexican Artificial Intelligence startups with a global profile
value.excerpt: Kueski, Intellion, Kuona Analytics, Pro Indie Music, BrandMe, Homie, Bayonet, and SoldAI are transforming the way we work with Big Data.
